amendment.description: An amendment to reduce funding for Federal salaries and expenses by $1 million and to increase funding for other Defense activities by $500,000.
amendment.purpose: Amendment allocates an additional $500,000 for sites where remediation is currently being conducted by the Office of Legacy Management at DOE in accordance with CERCLA and/or RCRA.
